Located in the trendy and attractive Chicago neighborhood of River North.
Just minutes away from everything, gives you quick access to everything River North has to offer.
Offers sleek hardwood flooring, oversized windows, and stainless steel appliances.
Also offers an array of community amenities like a swimming pool, sun deck, business and conference sitting rooms, 24-hour state-of-the-art fitness center.
Luxurious 3 bedrooms with washer/dryer in unit.
Updated kitchen and bath with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, lots of light, and great location.
Walk to shopping, restaurants, and nightlife.
Close to public transit.
On-site gym, outdoor pool, roof deck, and much more.
$195 Utility package includes:  gas, water/sewage, trash, basic cable/internet powered by Comcast (140+ channels +HBO & 25 Mbps internet speed)
Includes X1 – voice command, DVR, & all HD.
Fiber optic speeds available w/ upgraded package.
An assigned parking space in a private garage is $250 per month attached to the lease.
